name: Before Reboot
description:
Sadece UE4 Silah'ı asset olarak bulunuyor. Onun dışında her şey bana ait.

Made in  72 hours

devoloped by mercann (just me)

YOU ARE HERE FOR FIX THINGS

A system error occurs at United Nations Venus Headquarters and all the criminals escape. You need to Reboot 3 different Servers for the soldiers to fix things.You land in the Headquarters with your spaceship and head towards the first server.

How to Play :

WASD | Movement

Left Click | Shoot

F | Dash (Only in Level 2&3)

Enter | Next Level
